Our mission at The Betz Team is to be your best resource for financial advice. Whether you are a buyer, seller, or investor, our team of professionals can answer any questions you might have about the lending process. Subscribe to this blog to get the latest news on loans for purchase, refinance, construction or cashout of residential and commercial property.

    • About Wade Betz


    Wade joined Guardian Mortgage Company in January 2006 as a vice president of sales and branch manager at our
    Dallas, Texas location.

    Wade has a message for Guardian’s customers. There’s more to a mortgage than the close. Wade, like his Guardian counterparts, understands that a job well done is a job that lasts the duration of the home loan. Counsel, support and personal service are paramount to becoming a trusted mortgage advisor for Guardian’s clients.

    Wade Betz
    NMLS #280613
